column1: The Royal Scottish Geographical Society
Each year RSGS runs a photographic competition for members. &nbsp
column2: There are prizes of photographic equipment, donated by our sponsors, and the winning photographs from each of the three subject categories (Scottish Views, People and the Environment, The Natural World) are published in the GeogScot newsletter.
column3: RSGS Regional Centres occasionally run their own preliminary competitions, the winners of which go forward to the national competition.

column2: (See below under Category 2 : People and the Environment)
